main event: A round, star-like object with a halo was observed making random motions over Montgomery, Alabama on 19 September 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object was reported at an altitude of about 250 feet or less., It was suggested that the sighting could be balloons released on the same date., The report is part of the historical Project Blue Book files., The object was described as having a whitish yellow glow and very bright.
